problem.markdown: >>Which of the following statements about non-depletable renewable energy systems are true?<< Choose the THREE characteristics that apply. [x] may require maintenance and repair [x] may have high upfront installation costs [ ] may experiece volatile fuel costs due to fluctuations in energy prices [x] do not produce waste products during operation [ ] do not use turbines to generate electricity [explanation] Renewable energy systems require installation and involve maintenance and repair. They do not produce waste products during operation. Some renewable energy systems such as hydro and wind do use turbines. [explanation]
problem.p: Which of the following statements about non-depletable renewable energy systems are true? Choose the THREE characteristics that apply.

checkboxgroup.label: Which of the following statements about non-depletable renewable energy systems are true?
checkboxgroup.choice: may have high upfront installation costs
may experiece volatile fuel costs due to fluctuations in energy prices
do not produce waste products during operation

div.p: Renewable energy systems require installation and involve maintenance and repair. They do not produce waste products during operation. Some renewable energy systems such as hydro and wind do use turbines.
